questions:
What is the photo mainly about?
A) A piece of art
B) A light fixture
C) A decorative bowl
D) A clock

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A light bulb
B) A flower
C) A mirror
D) A painting

What is the dominant color in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Red
C) Gold
D) Green

What is the shape of the object in the center of the photo?
A) Square
B) Circular
C) Triangular
D) Hexagonal

What kind of lighting is depicted in the photo?
A) Natural sunlight
B) LED strip lights
C) A ceiling light fixture
D) A table lamp

What is the texture of the object in the photo?
A) Smooth and shiny
B) Rough and matte
C) Textured and glittery
D) Soft and fuzzy

What is creating the illumination in the photo?
A) A candle
B) A light bulb
C) A flashlight
D) A lantern

What is the background color of the photo?
A) Black
B) White
C) Grey
D) Blue

What kind of ambiance does the photo suggest?
A) Warm and cozy
B) Cool and serene
C) Dark and mysterious
D) Bright and energetic

What is the shape of the shadow seen in the photo?
A) Square
B) Circular
C) Triangular
D) Rectangular

What is the most noticeable feature of the object in the photo?
A) Its size
B) Its color
C) Its shape
D) Its texture

What is the shape of the entire object in the photo?
A) Oval
B) Circular
C) Square
D) Rectangular

What is the effect of the light in the photo?
A) It creates a shadow
B) It highlights the texture
C) It changes color
D) It flickers

What is the perspective of the photo?
A) From above
B) From below
C) From the side
D) From a distance

What is the main source of light in the photo?
A) A window
B) The light fixture itself
C) A reflection
D) A screen

What is the primary element in the foreground of the photo?
A) The light fixture
B) The shadow
C) The ceiling
D) The walls

What is the light fixture's texture best described as?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Glittery
D) Matte

What is the probable function of the shadow in the photo?
A) To add depth
B) To create a pattern
C) To highlight the fixture
D) To obscure details

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) Indoor lighting
